showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:12}); // {Cid}
“Hey, hey,!
What's goin' on?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:13}); // {Yuffie}
“I was just getting into it!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:14}); // {Cait Sith}
“Vanished? That can't be!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:15}); // {Vincent}
“Stay on alert.
You never know when
Sephiroth might appear.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:19}); // Our purpose is to deliver the Black
Materia to our master.
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:20}); // Those who carry Jenova's cells…

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:29}); // [Save Point]
Access the Menu and select
{PURPLE}[SAVE]{WHITE} to save your game.

ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:18}); // “You're right.
This is the end of this body's usefulness.”
fadeScreen({r:12, g:16, b:64, speed:32, type:30}); // unused=0

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:9}); // {Tifa}
“He might still be nearby…”
fadeScreen({r:12, g:0, b:0, speed:0, type:30}); // unused=0
fadeScreen({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:0, type:0}); // unused=0
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:1, type:4, adjust:0});

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:7}); // {Barret}
“I'll take care of the Black Materia.
No matter what happens,
I'll be right here.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:10}); // {Red XIII}
“I'll protect the Black Materia
no matter what!”

ops.raw: a5 00 00 c8 ff cb 01 c2 ff 72 00

ops.description: showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:24}); // “This is the end…for all of you.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:28}); // “You cannot take on anymore Materia.
Please discard some Materia.”

dialogStrings:
{Barret}
“I'll take care of the Black Materia.
No matter what happens,
I'll be right here.”

{Red XIII}
“I'll protect the Black Materia
no matter what!”

{Vincent}
“Stay on alert.
You never know when
Sephiroth might appear.”

“What I wanted was a body.
A seeing, hearing, moving body.
Soon it will be…over.”

“You're right.
This is the end of this body's usefulness.”

Our purpose is to deliver the Black
Materia to our master.
“This is the end…for all of you.”

“You cannot take on anymore Materia.
Please discard some Materia.”

[Save Point]
Access the Menu and select
{PURPLE}[SAVE]{WHITE} to save your game.
